turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'd like to place a Bella Luna pickup order, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get three large, gluten-free crust, pizzas with pepperoni and mushrooms, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you wanted the same toppings for all 3?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 large gluten free crust pizzas with pepperoni and mushrooms, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $72, and your order will be ready in 35 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you very much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you, can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all I need this afternoon. Thank you very much.
